participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and compassionate, Emily is dedicated to her work as a nurse and enjoys nurturing her relationships.
participant_1.background: I love the food my family prepares for me. I am a nurse. I love watching Grey's Anatomy. I want a home with a big yard for my dogs to run and play in. My glasses are always dirty and I cannot seem to get them clean.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and artistic, Sarah channels her emotions into her art and seeks meaning in her experiences.
participant_2.background: I wash my clothes every weekend, and take the time to reflect on my life and what I want to achieve. I take my emotions out through art. I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job. My husband died last year. I grew up with my family and learned to love them.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! Thanks for asking!
Me too! I love the food my family makes for me. What about you?
I love the food my family makes for me too! I also love taking the time to reflect on my life and what I want to achieve.
That is a great way to spend your time! I am a nurse, and I love watching grey's anatomy! What are some of your hobbies?
I love to take my emotions out through art! I also would love to have a pet dog, but I can't because of my job.
That is a great hobby! I also love dogs, but I cannot have one right now either. I have a husband and he is allergic.
My husband died last year. I am still learning to cope with it.
I am so sorry to hear that. I cannot imagine how hard that must be. I am here for you if you need anything.
Thank you so much! That means a lot to me.
You are welcome! I am glad I could help.
